safetyProcedure.title: Electrical Safety Procedures
safetyProcedure.step: Ensure aircraft power is OFF before starting electrical work
Use lockout/tagout procedures on circuit breakers
Verify zero energy state with appropriate test equipment
Use properly rated PPE for electrical work

safetyProcedure.title: Fuel System Safety Procedures
safetyProcedure.step: Ensure no ignition sources within 50 feet of fuel operations
Use grounding straps to prevent static discharge
Have fire suppression equipment readily available
